Flow.description: US0602. New 'universal' process to issue post-case NPS surveys for Procurements, Enquiries and Tech-Support (replacing earlier separate Process and Workflow Rule). Also handles 'Progress Stage' on Procurements (replacing the earlier separate 'Progress Stage' Process)

value.stringValue:
AND(
[Case].Case_Record_Type__c = 'Procurement_Low_Value',
ISCHANGED([Case].Status),
ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , 'Complete'),
NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactID)),
NOT([Case].Survey_Issued__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Exempt__c )
)

AND(
[Case].Case_Type__c = 'Procurement',
NOT([Case].Case_Record_Type__c = 'Procurement_Low_Value'),
[Case].Progress_Stage__c = TRUE,
NOT(ISBLANK([Case].Stage__c )),
[Case].Stage__c.Next_Stage__c.Name = 'Closing Actions',
NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactID)),
NOT([Case].Survey_Issued__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Exempt__c )
)

AND(
[Case].Case_Record_Type__c = 'Enquiry',
ISCHANGED([Case].Status),
ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , 'Closed'),
ISPICKVAL([Case].Resolution_1__c , 'Information Given'),
NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId )),
NOT([Case].Survey_Pending__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Issued__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Exempt__c )
)

AND(
[Case].Case_Record_Type__c = 'Enquiry',
ISCHANGED([Case].Status),
ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , 'Closed'),
ISPICKVAL([Case].Resolution_1__c , 'Information Given'),
NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId )),
NOT([Case].Survey_Pending__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Issued__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Exempt__c )
)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_4_pmetrule
formulas.expression:
AND(
{!myVariable_old.Case_Record_Type__c} = 'Enquiry',
ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.Status}),
ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Status} , 'Closed'),
ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_old.Resolution_1__c} , 'Information Given'),
NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_old.ContactId} )),
NOT({!myVariable_old.Survey_Pending__c} ),
NOT({!myVariable_old.Survey_Issued__c} ),
NOT({!myVariable_old.Survey_Exempt__c} )
)

value.stringValue:
AND(
[Case].Case_Record_Type__c = 'Enquiry',
ISCHANGED([Case].Status),
ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , 'Closed'),
ISPICKVAL([Case].Resolution_1__c , 'Information Given - No NPS Survey'),
NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId )),
NOT([Case].Survey_Pending__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Issued__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Exempt__c )
)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_7
formulas.expression:
AND(
{!myVariable_current.Case_Record_Type__c} = 'Enquiry',
ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}),
ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , 'Closed'),
ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Resolution_1__c} , 'Information Given - No NPS Survey'),
NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.ContactId} )),
NOT({!myVariable_current.Survey_Pending__c} ),
NOT({!myVariable_current.Survey_Issued__c} ),
NOT({!myVariable_current.Survey_Exempt__c} )
)

value.stringValue:
AND(
[Case].Case_Record_Type__c = 'Tech_Support',
ISCHANGED([Case].Status),
ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , 'Closed'),
ISPICKVAL([Case].HD_Team__c, 'Technology Support'),
NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].HD_Support_Classification__c , 'SPAM')),
NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].HD_Support_Classification__c , 'Duplicate Case')),
NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactID)),
NOT([Case].Survey_Pending__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Issued__c ),
NOT([Case].Survey_Exempt__c )
)

Flow.label: Case - Issue NPS Surveys and Progress Procurement Stages

recordUpdates.name: myRule_15_A3
recordUpdates.label: Set Actual Start Date on Next Stage

value.stringValue: Case Owner Selected No NPS Survey
